type.name: classified_attribute_select
type.description: The entities that whose attributes values are classified.

entity.name: attribute_classification
entity.description:
The association of a class to an attribute of an entity in order to characterize it further.
The value of the attribute being classified is the same as the id of the class.

explicit.name: classifier
explicit.description: The class that has enity_reference as member.

explicit.name: entity_reference
explicit.description: The entity to which the attribute named in attribute_name belongs.
